item.title: Operating System
item.author: iris.garcia.desebastian@gmail.com (Iris Garcia)
item.description: Debian is the selected Operating System for the following reasons: Stability Debian is one of the oldest distributions and it is famous because of its stability, any package has been tested thoroughly before included in a Debian stable release. Security Debian community is very responsive to bug fixing, security is one of the most important Debian features and this is very convenient for a production server. Free - Open Source Debian has a social contract with the Free Software Community, which means we are free to use any software that suits our needs.

item.title: Ansible
item.author: iris.garcia.desebastian@gmail.com (Iris Garcia)
item.description: Structure Figure 1: directory structure Playbook The following playbook has been created: -name:Basesetuphosts:apigather_facts:nobecome:yestags:-basevars:USER:"workday"PACKAGES:-git-wgetpre_tasks:-name:Installsystempackagesapt:name:"{{ PACKAGES }}"update_cache:yesroles:-role:user-name:SetupGolanghosts:apigather_facts:nobecome:yestags:-govars:GO_VERSION:"1.13.3"roles:-role:go-name:SetupbuildtoolMagehosts:apigather_facts:nobecome:yestags:-buildtoolvars:USER:"workday"roles:-role:mage-name:Setupprocessmanagerpm2hosts:apigather_facts:nobecome:yestags:-pm2roles:-role:pm2 Code Snippet 1: .packer/ansible/workday.yml It has four main tasks, each of them run a role and has a tag defined to allow running a one or more tasks instead of the whole playbook. The use of become: yes is needed because the playbook is ran using the vagrant user, therefore privileged rights are needed.

item.title: Task manager configuration
item.author: iris.garcia.desebastian@gmail.com (Iris Garcia)
item.description: Two new tasks has been added to the task manager: Create VM and Provision // CreateVM creates a vagrant box already provisioned func CreateVM() error { cwd, err := os.Getwd() if err != nil { fmt.Printf("Error: ", err.Error()) } cmd := exec.Command("packer", "build", "-var", "'version=10.2.0'", "debian10.json") cmd.Dir = cwd + "/.packer" cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout cmd.Stderr = os.Stderr return cmd.Run() } A wrapper which creates a VirtualBox VM and then provisions it with Ansible.
